comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: Sandbags were used to protect buildings from the expected bombing. Here are seen children and adults sharing in the work and the fun of placing sandbags on a building in Morda, near Oswestry, over the border in Shropshire.
